metadata.name: Potential MSTSC Shadowing Activity
metadata.comment: Detects RDP session hijacking by using MSTSC shadowing

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('noconsentprompt')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('shadow:')))

output.summary: Detects RDP session hijacking by using MSTSC shadowing
